description.value:
The antipaladin infuses the target with negative energy. If the target is living, this deals [[/r 3d6 #negative]] negative damage (basic Fortitude save); on a failed saving throw, the target also takes a –2 status penalty to AC for 1 round.

If the target is a willing undead creature, the target regains 18 Hit Points, and if it is one of the antipaladin's allies, it also gains a +2 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 round.

target.value: 1 willing undead creature or 1 living creature

description.value:
Trigger An enemy within 15 feet damages the antipaladin;
Effect The antipaladin increases the amount of damage they take by [[/r 2d6]] and deals [[/r 2d6]] damage to the triggering enemy, choosing evil or negative damage. In addition, the antipaladin deals [[/r 2]] extra damage of the chosen type with their @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strikes} against the triggering creature until the end of the antipaladin’s next turn.

The antipaladin makes a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike}. If they hit and deal damage, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 1, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} 2 on a critical hit.
Enzymatic compounds in this elixir strengthen and excite the muscles in your legs. You gain a status bonus to your Speed for the listed duration. The bonus is +5 feet, and the duration is 1 minute.
description.label: Description

description.value: This large battle axe is too heavy to wield with only one hand. Many greataxes incorporate two blades, and they are often “bearded,” having a hook at the bottom to increase the strength of their chopping power.
description.label: Description

description.value: Half plate consists of most of the upper body plates used in full plate, with lighter or sparser steel plate protection for the arms and legs. This provides some of the protection of full plate with greater flexibility and speed. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor (see below) and a pair of gauntlets (page 285).
description.label: Description

description.value: This thin spear is well balanced for throwing but is not designed for melee use.
description.label: Description
